review: Above all, the price is right for the device and the bundled service for Prime customers. There is not a huge lot of selection in movie and TV, but good enough for "free" when you are already on prime. User interface is good, on par with Netflix, and years ahead of Comcast. Overall picture quality is decent, although there are video artifacts in fast transition scenes.
